isOpen(int).Description: Returns a matcher that verifies that the drawer with the specified gravity is open. Matches only when the drawer is fully open. Use @B_android#support#test#espresso#contrib#DrawerMatchers#isClosed_E@ instead of not(isOpen()) when you wish to check that the drawer is fully closed.

isOpen().Description: Returns a matcher that verifies that the drawer (with gravity START) is open. Matches only when the drawer is fully open. Use @B_android#support#test#espresso#contrib#DrawerMatchers#isClosed_E@ instead of not(isOpen()) when you wish to check that the drawer is fully closed.

isClosed().Description: Returns a matcher that verifies that the drawer (with gravity START) is closed. Matches only when the drawer is fully closed. Use @B_android#support#test#espresso#contrib#DrawerMatchers#isOpen_E@ instead of not(isClosed())) when you wish to check that the drawer is fully open.

isClosed(int).Description: Returns a matcher that verifies that the drawer with the specified gravity is closed. Matches only when the drawer is fully closed. Use @B_android#support#test#espresso#contrib#DrawerMatchers#isOpen_E@ instead of not(isClosed())) when you wish to check that the drawer is fully open.
